column4: Swiftly makes the changes necessary for strategic implementation, pre-empting events and aligning and mobilizing his/her staff.
Systematically uses external knowledge and experience in processes of improvement and renewal.
Integrates into the organizational environment by participating in and promoting teamwork and respecting and making use of diversity to enrich dialogue and the decision-making process.
We believe that our success is the result of joint construction, strengthened by genuine relations and alliances where everyone wins
We believe that we are able to always do more and better, exceeding challenges with discipline, humility, and simplicity
We believe and trust people, and for these reasons, we invest time and resources fostering talent
We believe that persons are unique and that they deserve to be valued fairly and according to their deliveries
We believe that an environment of confidence provides open dialogues and space for speaking up and being heard, where the diversity of opinions builds better solutions
